verses.verse: Then <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Can a <S%H1397>man<s%> be <S%H5532>profitable<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H3588>as<s%> he that is <S%H7919>wise<s%> may be <S%H5532>profitable<s%> unto himself?
Is it any <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, that thou art <S%H6663>righteous<s%>? or is it <S%H1215>gain<s%> to him, that thou makest thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8552>perfect<s%>?
Will he <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee for <S%H3374>fear<s%> of thee? will he <S%H935>enter<s%> with thee into <S%H4941>judgment<s%>?
Is not thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%>? and thine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H7093>infinite<s%>?
For thou hast taken a <S%H2254>pledge<s%> from thy <S%H251>brother<s%> for <S%H2600>nought<s%>, and <S%H6584>stripped<s%> the <S%H6174>naked<s%> of their <S%H899>clothing<s%>.
Thou hast not given <S%H4325>water<s%> to the <S%H5889>weary<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>, and thou hast <S%H4513>withholden<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> from the <S%H7457>hungry<s%>.
But as for the <S%H2220>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, he had the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and the honourable <S%H5375%H6440>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in it.
Thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> away <S%H7387>empty<s%>, and the <S%H2220>arms<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> have been <S%H1792>broken<s%>.
Therefore <S%H6341>snares<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> thee, and <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H926>troubleth<s%> thee;
Or <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, that thou canst not <S%H7200>see<s%>; and <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee.
Is not <S%H433>God<s%> in the <S%H1363>height<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>? and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H7218>height<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, how <S%H7311>high<s%> they are!
And thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, How doth <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%>? can he <S%H8199>judge<s%> through the dark <S%H6205>cloud<s%>?
Thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> are a <S%H5643>covering<s%> to him, that he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> not; and he <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in the <S%H2329>circuit<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Hast thou <S%H8104>marked<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H734>way<s%> which <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> have <S%H1869>trodden<s%>?
Which were cut <S%H7059>down<s%> out of <S%H6256>time<s%>, whose <S%H3247>foundation<s%> was <S%H3332>overflown<s%> with a <S%H5104>flood<s%>:
Which <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from us: and what can the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%> for them?
Yet he <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H2896>good<s%> things: but the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7368>far<s%> from me.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and are <S%H8055>glad<s%>: and the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> laugh them to <S%H3932>scorn<s%>.
<S%H518>Whereas<s%> our <S%H7009>substance<s%> is not cut <S%H3582>down<s%>, but the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of them the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumeth<s%>.
<S%H5532>Acquaint<s%> now thyself with him, and be at <S%H7999>peace<s%>: thereby <S%H2896>good<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee.
<S%H3947>Receive<s%>, I pray thee, the <S%H8451>law<s%> from his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and lay <S%H7760>up<s%> his <S%H561>words<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

If thou <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, thou shalt be built <S%H1129>up<s%>, thou shalt put <S%H7368>away<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from thy <S%H168>tabernacles<s%>.
Then shalt thou lay <S%H7896>up<s%> <S%H1220>gold<s%> <S%H5921>as<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and the gold of <S%H211>Ophir<s%> as the <S%H6697>stones<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%>.
Yea, the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> shall be thy <S%H1220>defence<s%>, and thou shalt have <S%H8443>plenty<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
For then shalt thou have thy <S%H6026>delight<s%> in the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, and shalt lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> unto <S%H433>God<s%>.
Thou shalt make thy <S%H6279>prayer<s%> unto him, and he shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H7999>pay<s%> thy <S%H5088>vows<s%>.
Thou shalt also <S%H1504>decree<s%> a <S%H562>thing<s%>, and it shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> unto thee: and the <S%H216>light<s%> shall <S%H5050>shine<s%> upon thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
When men are cast <S%H8213>down<s%>, then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, There is lifting <S%H1466>up<s%>; and he shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H7807>humble<s%> <S%H5869>person<s%>.
He shall <S%H4422>deliver<s%> the <S%H336>island<s%> of the <S%H5355>innocent<s%>: and it is <S%H4422>delivered<s%> by the <S%H1252>pureness<s%> of thine <S%H3709>hands<s%>.
